Sentence: Micawber leaves London to escape his (Micawber) creditors, David decides to search for his (David) father's sister, Miss Betsey Trotwood--his (David) only living relative
He (David) walks a long distance to Miss Betsey's home, and she (Betsey) takes him (David) in on the advice of her (Betsey) mentally unstable friend, Mr
Miss Betsey sends David to a school run by a man named Doctor Strong
When they return from Yarmouth, Miss Betsey persuades David to pursue a career as a proctor, a kind of lawyer
